name.ja: <ruby>珠<rt>たま</rt></ruby>の<ruby>御巫<rt>みかんこ</rt></ruby> フゥリ

text.en: If this card is not equipped with any Equip Card, you take no battle damage from battles involving it. If it is, it cannot be destroyed by battle, also your opponent takes any battle damage you would take from battles involving it instead. Your opponent cannot target "Mikanko" cards you control with card effects while you control an Equip Card. If this card becomes equipped with an Equip Card: You can add 1 "Mikanko" Trap from your Deck to your hand. You can only use this effect of "Furi the Orb Mikanko" once per turn.
